entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
